captions.text:
#hashtag interview
Artists pick keywords about themselves by themselves
Hello, we're GOT7
we're back with our second mini album!
#interview 8th GOT7
The first hashtag is 'A'
This album, 'GOT'♥(love)'s title track is called 'A'
We say 'A~' when we pretend we don't know and try to hide our feelings
So we changed that to alphabet 'A' to be the title of the song
A~ Why do you hide your feelings? I already know that
Can I sing a little longer?
Don't avoid me
Just go out with me
Look at me, why you so shy?
Don't be afraid. Yet I am not good neither.
But I think we can be a nice couple
Thank you
The most important part of the song is acting
There are a lot of cute elements in it
So when you see the stage, you are gonna say 'that's cute~'
Show it Yugyeom!
A~ Why do you hide your feelings

It is so obvious you like me
It is written all over your face
That was cute
This is teasing
What about me, what about me!!
Run to that side
The next hashtag is 'IGOT7'
Let's get the beat right
It is short for our fan club name is 'I GOT 7'
They are very precious to us
I love them and care for them
This is why his nick name is the King of fan service
He doesn't get in the car when we have to leave for next schedule
'We gotta get in the car'
Then he says, 'Wait a second' and keeps talking to our fans
Sometimes our manager says 'Please! let's go'
But as soon as he gets in the car he says 'I could talk to my fan!'
For GOT7, 'IGOT7' is like a 'padding jacket'
It keeps you warm when it's cold
When about when it's hot?
Right now? Padding jacket?
It's like fighting fire with fire
The next hashtag is #You like me, right?
No?
When we shoot for our teaser for this album,
we had that line 'A~ you like me, right?'
Suddenly, that felt so cheesy
A~ you like me, right?
To be honest, the line is so cheesy isn't it?
No I think it's fine
Why don't we go around and do it one by one
Whyyy
What do you think about me?
A~ you like this, don't you?
A~ you like this, don't you?
A~ why don't we play together?
Let's go
A~ why don't we play together? I'm JB
Hey! Let's go
Girls would love that
LEADER!
Can we stand there and watch him?
No I don't need you guys there
A~ you like me, don't you?
God please save us
The next hashtag is #GOT7_living together
That sounds kind of weird
We're living in the same house together
We're roommates, the youngest ones
We're roommates, the vocal line
We're rap, martial arts line
I'm left out
I use my own room
After sharing the room, you guys came up with the line thing
Vocal line, rap line, youngest ones line
What a laugh!
After using a room by myself, it's kind of sad
when they say 'we share a room~' but I go..
Then, next time you..
No, I want to use it by myself
I'm gonna use it by myself
No, there's the big teddy bear in your room
Yes I always talk to him
How was today?
It was okay for me
His my roommate
You got a problem
The last hashtag is #GOT love
It's the title for our second mini album
The song 'A' is a love story in some way
It's even before the 'some' part
You know what it's like, that freshness!
Our fans sent us some hash tags
We're gonna pick some of them and show you our individual skills
Powerful vocals
That's cute
No it's not
Show 'GOT♥' to your fans
Until now, this was GOT7! Thank you
